attributes.action: automatically allow registered blind people the higher rate component of Disabliity Living Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently blind people are not automatically given the higher rate of disability living allowance (DLA). The mobility of a blind person severely hampers any attempt at a basic amount of independance. Lower rate is £17 per week, whilst the higher rate is £46 per week. I'm not blind, but my brother is deaf and registered as blind and can not gain the higher rate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
